snippet: Three officers were killed and three wounded in the attack, which left many wondering whether anger at the police had prompted yet another act of retaliation....
abstract: Gavin Long fatally shoots three law enforcement officers and wounds three others in Baton Rouge, La, before being killed in shootout with police; attack by former marine comes amid protests and heightened tensions in city and nationwide after fatal shooting of Alton B Sterling there by police.

byline.original: By JULIE BLOOM, RICHARD FAUSSET and MIKE McPHATE
byline.contributor: Julie Bloom and Richard Fausset reported from Baton Rouge, and Mike McPhate from New York. Reporting was contributed by Alan Blinder from Dallas; Rick Rojas, Katie Rogers, Mike McIntire and Frances Robles from New York; Yamiche Alcindor from Cleveland; and Christiaan Mader from Baton Rouge.

lead_paragraph: Three officers were killed and three wounded in the attack, which left many wondering whether anger at the police had prompted yet another act of retaliation.

headline.main: Baton Rouge Shooting Jolts a Nation on Edge
headline.print_headline: Attack on Officers Jolts a Nation on Edge
